blockeraIcon.description: Support for "blockeraIcon.renderedIcon" value, provides a CSS custom property for SVG icon URL.

blockeraIconSize.description: Support for "blockeraIcon.size" value, provides a CSS custom property for SVG icon size.

blockeraIconGap.description: Support for "blockeraIcon.gap" value, provides a CSS custom property for SVG icon gap.

blockeraIconColor.description: Support for "blockeraIcon.color" value, provides a CSS custom property for SVG icon color.

blockeraIconRotate.description: Support for "blockeraIcon.rotate" value, provides a CSS custom property for SVG icon rotate.

blockeraIconFlipHorizontal.description: Support for "blockeraIcon.flipHorizontal" value, provides a CSS custom property for SVG icon flip horizontal.

blockeraIconFlipVertical.description: Support for "blockeraIcon.flipVertical" value, provides a CSS custom property for SVG icon flip vertical.
